steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
In the left sidebar, click on 'Options'.
In the Word Options dialog box, select 'Quick Access Toolbar' from the left sidebar.
In the 'Choose commands from' dropdown menu, select 'All Commands'.
Scroll down and select the command you want to add to the Quick Access Toolbar.
Click on the 'Add' button in the middle of the dialog box.
The selected command will be added to the list on the right side.
To change the order of the commands, select a command in the list and use the 'Up' and 'Down' buttons.
To remove a command from the Quick Access Toolbar, select the command in the list and click on the 'Remove' button.
Click on the 'OK' button to save the changes and close the Word Options dialog box.
